unnormalised: Arre bhai, Labor Law! Mhantlear “labor” korun ghoncholta, nai mhonnche? Mhozo chacha, Faridabadantlo ek lhan factory-cho dhoni, taka minimum pagar diunk na mhonn notice ailea - dista Rs. 12,000 atam porun puro zainam! Atam to bondd naslolo kombdo bhaxen bhonvta, Industrial Disputes Act-acho Sec. 25F somzunk sodhta. Punn tannem soglleank ₹5000 Diwalli bonus diunk favo aslem ani tem temch chukto korunk favo aslem. Legal doked, munis, tankam kednach sonvsornam!
normalised: Arre bhai, Labor Law! Mhanttlear "labor"iously ghonchgolit, nhoi mhunn? Mhozo chacha, Faridabadantlo ek lhan factoryecho dhoni, taka minimum poiso diunk na mhunn notice aili - dislelem bara hozar rupiya hanche disank purosonam! Atam to mastisko nastilea kombdde bhaxen bhonvta, Industrial Disputes Actacho Section twenty five F somzunk vavurta. Zaite zale zalear tannem soglleank Diwali bonus panch hozar rupiya diun ek disak soddunk favo aslem. Kaideanche tras, munxea, tankam kednaim xevott na!
text: Arre bhai, Labor Law! Mhantlear “labor” korun ghoncholta, nai mhonnche? Mhozo chacha, Faridabadantlo ek lhan factory-cho dhoni, taka minimum pagar diunk na mhonn notice ailea - dista Rs. 12,000 atam porun puro zainam! Atam to bondd naslolo kombdo bhaxen bhonvta, Industrial Disputes Act-acho Sec. 25F somzunk sodhta. Punn tannem soglleank ₹5000 Diwalli bonus diunk favo aslem ani tem temch chukto korunk favo aslem. Legal doked, munis, tankam kednach sonvsornam!
